templates.name: Análises comerciais
templates.defaultQuery:
SELECT   CAB.DTNEG AS "Dia",
         CAB.NUNOTA AS  "ID Nunota",
         CAB.NUNOTA AS "Nunota",
         NVL(PAR.CODPARC,-999) AS "ID Parceiro",
         NVL(PAR.RAZAOSOCIAL, 'Nulo') AS "Parceiro",
         NVL(TPP.CODTIPPARC ,-999)AS "ID Perfil",
         NVL(TPP.DESCRTIPPARC, 'Nulo') AS "Perfil",
         NVL(CID.CODCID,-999) AS "ID Cidade",
         NVL(CID.NOMECID, 'Nulo') AS "Cidade",
         NVL((CASE WHEN UF.UF = 'EX' OR UF.UF IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(UF.CODUF) ELSE UF.UF END), -999) AS "ID Estado",
         NVL(UF.DESCRICAO, 'Nulo') AS "Estado",
         NVL(REG.CODREG,-999) AS "ID Região",
         NVL(REG.NOMEREG, 'Nulo') AS "Região",
         NVL(NAT.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV1",
         NVL(NAT.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV1",
         NVL(NAT2.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV2",
         NVL(NAT2.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV2",
         NVL(NAT3.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV3",
         NVL(NAT3.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV3",
         NVL(NAT4.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV4",
         NVL(NAT4.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV4",
         NVL(PRO.CODPROD,-999) AS "ID Produto",
         NVL(PRO.DESCRPROD, 'Nulo') AS "Produto",
         NVL(PRO.MARCA,-999) AS "ID Marca",
         NVL(PRO.MARCA, 'Nulo') AS "Marca",
         NVL(GRU.CODGRUPOPROD,-999) AS "ID Grupo de Produtos",
         NVL(GRU.DESCRGRUPOPROD, 'Nulo') AS "Grupo de Produtos",
         NVL(CUS.CODCENCUS,-999) AS "ID Centro de Resultado",
         NVL(CUS.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') "Centro de Resultado",
         NVL(CUS2.CODCENCUS,-999) AS "ID Centro de Resultado Pai",
         NVL(CUS2.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') AS "Centro de Resultado Pai",
         NVL(EMP.CODEMP,-999) AS "ID Empresa",
         NVL(EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL, 'Nulo') AS "Empresa",
         NVL(VEN.CODVEND,-999) AS "ID Vendedor",
         NVL(VEN.APELIDO, 'Nulo') AS "Vendedor" ,
         NVL(GER.CODVEND,-999) AS "ID Gerente de Vendas",
         NVL(GER.APELIDO, 'Nulo') AS "Gerente de Vendas",
         NVL(TOP.CODTIPOPER,-999) AS " ID Tipo de Operação",
         NVL(TOP.DESCROPER, 'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Operação",
         NVL(TOP.TIPMOV,-999) AS "ID Tipo de Movimentação",
         NVL(TPM.OPCAO, 'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Movimentação",
         NVL(CAB.CODTIPVENDA,-999) AS "ID Tipo de Venda",
         NVL(TPV.DESCRTIPVENDA, 'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Venda",
         SUM(((ITE.VLRTOT - ITE.VLRDESC)) * CASE WHEN TOP.BONIFICACAO = 'S' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END * TOP.GOLDEV) AS "Vendas",
         SUM(((ITE.QTDNEG) * CASE WHEN TOP.BONIFICACAO = 'S' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) * TOP.GOLDEV) AS "Volume Vendas",
         0 AS "Vendas M.A.",
         0 AS "Volume Vendas M.A.",
         0 AS "Vendas A.A.",
         0 AS "Volume Vendas A.A."
  FROM TGFCAB CAB
  LEFT JOIN TGFITE ITE ON ITE.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA
  LEFT JOIN TGFPAR PAR ON PAR.CODPARC = CAB.CODPARC
  LEFT JOIN TGFTPP TPP ON TPP.CODTIPPARC = PAR.CODTIPPARC
  LEFT JOIN TSICID CID ON CID.CODCID = PAR.CODCID
  LEFT JOIN TSIUFS UF ON UF.CODUF = CID.UF
  LEFT JOIN TSIREG REG ON REG.CODREG = PAR.CODREG
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT ON NAT.CODNAT = CAB.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT2 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-2) = NAT2.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT3 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-4) = NAT3.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT4 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-5) = NAT4.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFPRO PRO ON PRO.CODPROD = ITE.CODPROD
  LEFT JOIN TGFGRU GRU ON GRU.CODGRUPOPROD = PRO.CODGRUPOPROD
  LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = CAB.CODCENCUS
  LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS2 ON TRUNC(CUS.CODCENCUS,-3) = CUS2.CODCENCUS
  LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = CAB.CODEMP
  LEFT JOIN TGFVEN VEN ON VEN.CODVEND = CAB.CODVEND
  LEFT JOIN TGFVEN GER ON VEN.CODGER = GER.CODVEND
  LEFT JOIN TGFTOP TOP ON TOP.CODTIPOPER = CAB.CODTIPOPER
  AND CAB.DHTIPOPER = TOP.DHALTER
  LEFT JOIN TGFTPV TPV ON TPV.CODTIPVENDA = CAB.CODTIPVENDA
  AND  CAB.DHTIPVENDA = TPV.DHALTER
  LEFT JOIN
    (SELECT VALOR, OPCAO FROM TDDOPC WHERE NUCAMPO = 856) TPM ON (TPM.VALOR = TOP.TIPMOV)
  LEFT JOIN 
   (SELECT MARCA, ROWNUM AS CODMARCA  FROM( SELECT DISTINCT MARCA FROM TGFPRO)A)B ON PRO.MARCA = B.MARCA
WHERE CAB.STATUSNOTA = 'L' 
AND CAB.TIPMOV = 'V'
AND TOP.GOLSINAL = -1
 GROUP BY CAB.NUNOTA,
           CAB.NUNOTA,
           CAB.DTNEG,
           PAR.CODPARC,
           PAR.RAZAOSOCIAL,
           TPP.CODTIPPARC,
           CID.CODCID,
           CID.NOMECID,
           NVL((CASE WHEN UF.UF = 'EX' OR UF.UF IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(UF.CODUF) ELSE UF.UF END), -999),
           UF.DESCRICAO,
           REG.CODREG,
           REG.NOMEREG,
           NAT.CODNAT,
           NAT.DESCRNAT,
           NAT2.CODNAT,
           NAT2.DESCRNAT,
           NAT3.CODNAT,
           NAT3.DESCRNAT,
           NAT4.CODNAT,
           NAT4.DESCRNAT,
           PRO.CODPROD,
           PRO.DESCRPROD,
           PRO.MARCA,
           PRO.MARCA,
           GRU.CODGRUPOPROD,
           GRU.DESCRGRUPOPROD,
           CUS.CODCENCUS,
           CUS.DESCRCENCUS,
           CUS2.CODCENCUS,
           CUS2.DESCRCENCUS,
           EMP.CODEMP,
           EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
           VEN.CODVEND,
           VEN.APELIDO,
           GER.CODVEND,
           GER.APELIDO,
           TOP.CODTIPOPER,
           TOP.DESCROPER,
           TOP.TIPMOV,
           TPM.OPCAO,
           TPP.DESCRTIPPARC,
           CAB.CODTIPVENDA,
           TPV.DESCRTIPVENDA 

UNION ALL 

 SELECT   ADD_MONTHS(CAB.DTNEG, 1)AS "Dia",
         CAB.NUNOTA AS  "ID Nunota",
         CAB.NUNOTA AS "Nunota",
         NVL(PAR.CODPARC,-999) AS "ID Parceiro",
         NVL(PAR.RAZAOSOCIAL, 'Nulo') AS "Parceiro",
         NVL(TPP.CODTIPPARC ,-999)AS "ID Perfil",
         NVL(TPP.DESCRTIPPARC, 'Nulo') AS "Perfil",
         NVL(CID.CODCID,-999) AS "ID Cidade",
         NVL(CID.NOMECID, 'Nulo') AS "Cidade",
         NVL((CASE WHEN UF.UF = 'EX' OR UF.UF IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(UF.CODUF) ELSE UF.UF END), -999) AS "ID Estado",
         NVL(UF.DESCRICAO, 'Nulo') AS "Estado",
         NVL(REG.CODREG,-999) AS "ID Região",
         NVL(REG.NOMEREG, 'Nulo') AS "Região",
         NVL(NAT.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV1",
         NVL(NAT.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV1",
         NVL(NAT2.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV2",
         NVL(NAT2.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV2",
         NVL(NAT3.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV3",
         NVL(NAT3.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV3",
         NVL(NAT4.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV4",
         NVL(NAT4.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV4",
         NVL(PRO.CODPROD,-999) AS "ID Produto",
         NVL(PRO.DESCRPROD, 'Nulo') AS "Produto",
         NVL(PRO.MARCA,-999) AS "ID Marca",
         NVL(PRO.MARCA, 'Nulo') AS "Marca",
         NVL(GRU.CODGRUPOPROD,-999) AS "ID Grupo de Produtos",
         NVL(GRU.DESCRGRUPOPROD, 'Nulo') AS "Grupo de Produtos",
         NVL(CUS.CODCENCUS,-999) AS "ID Centro de Resultado",
         NVL(CUS.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') "Centro de Resultado",
         NVL(CUS2.CODCENCUS,-999) AS "ID Centro de Resultado Pai",
         NVL(CUS2.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') AS "Centro de Resultado Pai",
         NVL(EMP.CODEMP,-999) AS "ID Empresa",
         NVL(EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL, 'Nulo') AS "Empresa",
         NVL(VEN.CODVEND,-999) AS "ID Vendedor",
         NVL(VEN.APELIDO, 'Nulo') AS "Vendedor" ,
         NVL(GER.CODVEND,-999) AS "ID Gerente de Vendas",
         NVL(GER.APELIDO, 'Nulo') AS "Gerente de Vendas",
         NVL(TOP.CODTIPOPER,-999) AS " ID Tipo de Operação",
         NVL(TOP.DESCROPER, 'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Operação",
         NVL(TOP.TIPMOV,-999) AS "ID Tipo de Movimentação",
         NVL(TPM.OPCAO, 'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Movimentação",
         NVL(CAB.CODTIPVENDA,-999) AS "ID Tipo de Venda",
         NVL(TPV.DESCRTIPVENDA, 'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Venda",
         0 AS "Vendas",
         0 AS "Volume Vendas",
         SUM(((ITE.VLRTOT - ITE.VLRDESC)) * CASE WHEN TOP.BONIFICACAO = 'S' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END * TOP.GOLDEV) AS  "Vendas M.A.",
         SUM(((ITE.QTDNEG) * CASE WHEN TOP.BONIFICACAO = 'S' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) * TOP.GOLDEV) AS "Volume Vendas M.A.",
         0 AS "Vendas A.A.",
         0 AS "Volume Vendas A.A."
  FROM TGFCAB CAB
  LEFT JOIN TGFITE ITE ON ITE.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA
  LEFT JOIN TGFPAR PAR ON PAR.CODPARC = CAB.CODPARC
  LEFT JOIN TGFTPP TPP ON TPP.CODTIPPARC = PAR.CODTIPPARC
  LEFT JOIN TSICID CID ON CID.CODCID = PAR.CODCID
  LEFT JOIN TSIUFS UF ON UF.CODUF = CID.UF
  LEFT JOIN TSIREG REG ON REG.CODREG = PAR.CODREG
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT ON NAT.CODNAT = CAB.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT2 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-2) = NAT2.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT3 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-4) = NAT3.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT4 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-5) = NAT4.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFPRO PRO ON PRO.CODPROD = ITE.CODPROD
  LEFT JOIN TGFGRU GRU ON GRU.CODGRUPOPROD = PRO.CODGRUPOPROD
  LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = CAB.CODCENCUS
  LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS2 ON TRUNC(CUS.CODCENCUS,-3) = CUS2.CODCENCUS
  LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = CAB.CODEMP
  LEFT JOIN TGFVEN VEN ON VEN.CODVEND = CAB.CODVEND
  LEFT JOIN TGFVEN GER ON VEN.CODGER = GER.CODVEND
  LEFT JOIN TGFTOP TOP ON TOP.CODTIPOPER = CAB.CODTIPOPER
  AND CAB.DHTIPOPER = TOP.DHALTER
  LEFT JOIN TGFTPV TPV ON TPV.CODTIPVENDA = CAB.CODTIPVENDA  
  AND  CAB.DHTIPVENDA = TPV.DHALTER
  LEFT JOIN
    (SELECT VALOR, OPCAO FROM TDDOPC WHERE NUCAMPO = 856) TPM ON (TPM.VALOR = TOP.TIPMOV)
      LEFT JOIN 
    (SELECT MARCA, ROWNUM AS CODMARCA  FROM( SELECT DISTINCT MARCA FROM TGFPRO)A)B ON PRO.MARCA = B.MARCA
WHERE CAB.STATUSNOTA = 'L' 
AND CAB.TIPMOV = 'V'
AND TOP.GOLSINAL = -1
  GROUP BY CAB.NUNOTA,
           CAB.NUNOTA,
           CAB.DTNEG,
           PAR.CODPARC,
           PAR.RAZAOSOCIAL,
           TPP.CODTIPPARC,
           CID.CODCID,
           CID.NOMECID,
           NVL((CASE WHEN UF.UF = 'EX' OR UF.UF IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(UF.CODUF) ELSE UF.UF END), -999),
           UF.DESCRICAO,
           REG.CODREG,
           REG.NOMEREG,
           NAT.CODNAT,
           NAT.DESCRNAT,
           NAT2.CODNAT,
           NAT2.DESCRNAT,
           NAT3.CODNAT,
           NAT3.DESCRNAT,
           NAT4.CODNAT,
           NAT4.DESCRNAT,
           PRO.CODPROD,
           PRO.DESCRPROD,
           PRO.MARCA,
           PRO.MARCA,
           GRU.CODGRUPOPROD,
           GRU.DESCRGRUPOPROD,
           CUS.CODCENCUS,
           CUS.DESCRCENCUS,
           CUS2.CODCENCUS,
           CUS2.DESCRCENCUS,
           EMP.CODEMP,
           EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
           VEN.CODVEND,
           VEN.APELIDO,
           GER.CODVEND,
           GER.APELIDO,
           TOP.CODTIPOPER,
           TOP.DESCROPER,
           TOP.TIPMOV,
           TPM.OPCAO,
           TPP.DESCRTIPPARC,
           CAB.CODTIPVENDA,
           TPV.DESCRTIPVENDA 

UNION ALL 

 SELECT   ADD_MONTHS(CAB.DTNEG, 12 )AS "Dia",
         CAB.NUNOTA AS  "ID Nunota",
         CAB.NUNOTA AS "Nunota",
         NVL(PAR.CODPARC,-999) AS "ID Parceiro",
         NVL(PAR.RAZAOSOCIAL, 'Nulo') AS "Parceiro",
         NVL(TPP.CODTIPPARC ,-999)AS "ID Perfil",
         NVL(TPP.DESCRTIPPARC, 'Nulo') AS "Perfil",
         NVL(CID.CODCID,-999) AS "ID Cidade",
         NVL(CID.NOMECID, 'Nulo') AS "Cidade",
         NVL((CASE WHEN UF.UF = 'EX' OR UF.UF IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(UF.CODUF) ELSE UF.UF END), -999) AS "ID Estado",
         NVL(UF.DESCRICAO, 'Nulo') AS "Estado",
         NVL(REG.CODREG,-999) AS "ID Região",
         NVL(REG.NOMEREG, 'Nulo') AS "Região",
         NVL(NAT.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV1",
         NVL(NAT.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV1",
         NVL(NAT2.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV2",
         NVL(NAT2.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV2",
         NVL(NAT3.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV3",
         NVL(NAT3.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV3",
         NVL(NAT4.CODNAT,-999) AS "ID Natureza NV4",
         NVL(NAT4.DESCRNAT, 'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV4",
         NVL(PRO.CODPROD,-999) AS "ID Produto",
         NVL(PRO.DESCRPROD, 'Nulo') AS "Produto",
         NVL(PRO.MARCA,-999) AS "ID Marca",
         NVL(PRO.MARCA, 'Nulo') AS "Marca",
         NVL(GRU.CODGRUPOPROD,-999) AS "ID Grupo de Produtos",
         NVL(GRU.DESCRGRUPOPROD, 'Nulo') AS "Grupo de Produtos",
         NVL(CUS.CODCENCUS,-999) AS "ID Centro de Resultado",
         NVL(CUS.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') "Centro de Resultado",
         NVL(CUS2.CODCENCUS,-999) AS "ID Centro de Resultado Pai",
         NVL(CUS2.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') AS "Centro de Resultado Pai",
         NVL(EMP.CODEMP,-999) AS "ID Empresa",
         NVL(EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL, 'Nulo') AS "Empresa",
         NVL(VEN.CODVEND,-999) AS "ID Vendedor",
         NVL(VEN.APELIDO, 'Nulo') AS "Vendedor" ,
         NVL(GER.CODVEND,-999) AS "ID Gerente de Vendas",
         NVL(GER.APELIDO, 'Nulo') AS "Gerente de Vendas",
         NVL(TOP.CODTIPOPER,-999) AS " ID Tipo de Operação",
         NVL(TOP.DESCROPER, 'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Operação",
         NVL(TOP.TIPMOV,-999) AS "ID Tipo de Movimentação",
         NVL(TPM.OPCAO, 'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Movimentação",
         NVL(CAB.CODTIPVENDA,-999) AS "ID Tipo de Venda",
         NVL(TPV.DESCRTIPVENDA, 'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Venda",
         0 AS "Vendas",
         0 AS "Volume Vendas",
         0 AS  "Vendas M.A.",
         0 AS "Volume Vendas M.A.",
         SUM(((ITE.VLRTOT - ITE.VLRDESC)) * CASE WHEN TOP.BONIFICACAO = 'S' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END * TOP.GOLDEV) AS  "Vendas A.A.",
         SUM(((ITE.QTDNEG) * CASE WHEN TOP.BONIFICACAO = 'S' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) * TOP.GOLDEV) AS "Volume Vendas A.A."
  FROM TGFCAB CAB
  LEFT JOIN TGFITE ITE ON ITE.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA
  LEFT JOIN TGFPAR PAR ON PAR.CODPARC = CAB.CODPARC
  LEFT JOIN TGFTPP TPP ON TPP.CODTIPPARC = PAR.CODTIPPARC
  LEFT JOIN TSICID CID ON CID.CODCID = PAR.CODCID
  LEFT JOIN TSIUFS UF ON UF.CODUF = CID.UF
  LEFT JOIN TSIREG REG ON REG.CODREG = PAR.CODREG
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT ON NAT.CODNAT = CAB.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT2 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-2) = NAT2.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT3 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-4) = NAT3.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT4 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-5) = NAT4.CODNAT
  LEFT JOIN TGFPRO PRO ON PRO.CODPROD = ITE.CODPROD
  LEFT JOIN TGFGRU GRU ON GRU.CODGRUPOPROD = PRO.CODGRUPOPROD
  LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = CAB.CODCENCUS
  LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS2 ON TRUNC(CUS.CODCENCUS,-3) = CUS2.CODCENCUS
  LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = CAB.CODEMP
  LEFT JOIN TGFVEN VEN ON VEN.CODVEND = CAB.CODVEND
  LEFT JOIN TGFVEN GER ON VEN.CODGER = GER.CODVEND
  LEFT JOIN TGFTOP TOP ON TOP.CODTIPOPER = CAB.CODTIPOPER
  AND CAB.DHTIPOPER = TOP.DHALTER
  LEFT JOIN TGFTPV TPV ON TPV.CODTIPVENDA = CAB.CODTIPVENDA  
  AND  CAB.DHTIPVENDA = TPV.DHALTER
  LEFT JOIN
    (SELECT VALOR, OPCAO FROM TDDOPC WHERE NUCAMPO = 856) TPM ON (TPM.VALOR = TOP.TIPMOV)
      LEFT JOIN 
    (SELECT MARCA, ROWNUM AS CODMARCA  FROM( SELECT DISTINCT MARCA FROM TGFPRO)A)B ON PRO.MARCA = B.MARCA
WHERE CAB.STATUSNOTA = 'L' 
AND CAB.TIPMOV = 'V'
AND TOP.GOLSINAL = -1

           CAB.NUNOTA,
           CAB.DTNEG,

           PAR.RAZAOSOCIAL,
           TPP.CODTIPPARC,
           CID.CODCID,
           CID.NOMECID,
           NVL((CASE WHEN UF.UF = 'EX' OR UF.UF IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(UF.CODUF) ELSE UF.UF END), -999),

templates.name: Análises financeiras
templates.defaultQuery:
SELECT
DIA AS "Data",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODNUFIN,-999)) AS "ID Nufin",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODNUFIN,-999)) AS "Nufin",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODPARC,-999)) AS "ID Parceiro",
NVL(PARCEIRO, 'Nulo') "Parceiro",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODPERFIL,-999)) AS "ID Perfil",
NVL(PERFIL,'Nulo') AS "Perfil",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODCID,-999)) AS "ID Cidade",
NVL(CIDADE,'Nulo') AS "Cidade",
NVL(CODUF, -999) AS "ID Estado",
NVL(UF,'Nulo') AS "Estado",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODREG, -999)) AS "ID Região",
NVL(REGIAO,'Nulo') AS "Região",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODNAT1, -999)) AS "ID Natureza NV1",
NVL(NAT1,'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV1",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODNAT2, -999)) AS "ID Natureza NV2",
NVL(NAT2,'Nulo')AS "Natureza NV2",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODNAT3, -999)) AS "ID Natureza NV3",
NVL(NAT3,'Nulo')AS "Natureza NV3",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODNAT4, -999)) AS "ID Natureza NV4",
NVL(NAT4,'Nulo') AS "Natureza NV4",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODCENCUS, -999)) AS "ID Centro de Resultado",
NVL(CENCUS,'Nulo') AS "Centro de Resultado",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODCENCUSPAI, -999)) AS "ID Centro de Resultado Pai",
NVL(CENCUSPAI,'Nulo') AS "Centro de Resultado Pai",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODEMP, -999)) AS "ID Empresa",
NVL(EMPRESA,'Nulo') AS "Empresa",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODVEND, -999)) AS "ID Vendedor",
NVL(VENDEDOR,'Nulo') AS "Vendedor",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODGER, -999)) AS "ID Gerente de Vendas",
NVL(GERENTE,'Nulo') AS "Gerente de Vendas",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODTIPOPER, -999)) AS "ID Tipo de Operação",
NVL(TOP,'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Operação",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODTIPMOV, -999)) AS "ID Tipo de Movimentação",
NVL(TIPMOV,'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Movimentação",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODTIPTIT, -999)) AS "ID Tipo de Título",
NVL(TIPTIT,'Nulo') AS "Tipo de Título",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODCTABCOINT, -999)) AS "ID Conta Bancária",
NVL(CTABCOINT,'Nulo') AS "Conta Bancária",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODBCO, -999)) AS "ID Banco",
NVL(BANCO,'Nulo') AS "Banco",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODCLASSE, -999)) AS "ID Classe",
NVL(CLASSE,'Nulo') AS "Classe",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODCON, -999)) AS "ID Contrato",
NVL(CONTRATO, -999) AS "Contrato",
NVL(CODPROV, -999) AS "ID Provisão",
NVL(PROVISAO, 'Nulo') AS "Provisão",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODSTATUS,-999)) AS "ID Status",
NVL(STATUS,'Nulo') AS "Status",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODTIPOFIN,-999)) AS "ID Tipo Financeiro",
NVL(TIPOFIN,'Nulo') AS "Tipo Financeiro",
TO_CHAR(NVL(CODRECDESP,-999)) AS "ID Recdesp",
NVL(RECDESP, 'Nulo') AS "Recdesp",
NVL(RECEITAS, 0) AS "Receitas",
NVL(DESPESAS, 0) AS "Despesas",
NVL(RECABERTO, 0) AS "A Receber",
NVL(DESPABERTO, 0) AS "A Pagar",
NVL(SALDO, 0) AS "Saldo Bancario",
NVL(DIF, 0) AS "Divergencias",
NVL(FLUXO, 0) AS "Fluxo de Caixa"
FROM
(SELECT TRUNC(DTVENC) AS DIA,
NUFIN AS CODNUFIN,
NUFIN AS NUFIN,
PAR.CODPARC AS CODPARC,
PAR.RAZAOSOCIAL AS PARCEIRO,
TPP.CODTIPPARC AS CODPERFIL,
TPP.DESCRTIPPARC AS PERFIL,
CID.CODCID AS CODCID,
CID.NOMECID AS CIDADE,
UF.UF AS CODUF,
UF.DESCRICAO AS UF,
REG.CODREG AS CODREG,
REG.NOMEREG AS REGIAO,
NAT.CODNAT AS CODNAT1,
NAT.DESCRNAT AS NAT1,
NAT2.CODNAT AS CODNAT2,
NAT2.DESCRNAT AS NAT2,
NAT3.CODNAT AS CODNAT3,
NAT3.DESCRNAT AS NAT3,
NAT4.CODNAT AS CODNAT4,
NAT4.DESCRNAT AS NAT4,
CUS.CODCENCUS AS CODCENCUS,
CUS.DESCRCENCUS AS CENCUS,
CUS2.CODCENCUS AS CODCENCUSPAI,
CUS2.DESCRCENCUS AS CENCUSPAI,
EMP.CODEMP AS CODEMP,
EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL AS EMPRESA,
VEN.CODVEND AS CODVEND,
VEN.APELIDO AS VENDEDOR ,
GER.CODVEND AS CODGER,
GER.APELIDO AS GERENTE,
TOP.CODTIPOPER AS CODTIPOPER,
TOP.DESCROPER AS TOP,
TOP.TIPMOV AS CODTIPMOV,
TPV.OPCAO AS TIPMOV,
TIT.CODTIPTIT AS CODTIPTIT,
TIT.DESCRTIPTIT AS TIPTIT,
CTA.CODCTABCOINT AS CODCTABCOINT,
CTA.DESCRICAO AS CTABCOINT,
BCO.CODBCO AS CODBCO,
BCO.ABREVIATURA AS BANCO,
CLS.VALOR AS CODCLASSE,
CLS.OPCAO AS CLASSE,
FIN.NUMCONTRATO AS CODCON,
FIN.NUMCONTRATO AS CONTRATO,
FIN.PROVISAO AS CODPROV,
CASE
WHEN FIN.PROVISAO = 'N' THEN 'Não'
ELSE 'Sim'
END AS PROVISAO,
CASE
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) >= 0 THEN 1
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) BETWEEN -7 AND -1 THEN 2
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) BETWEEN -15 AND -8 THEN 3
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) BETWEEN -30 AND -16 THEN 4
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) < -30 THEN 5
END AS CODSTATUS,
CASE
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) >= 0 THEN 'Em dia'
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) BETWEEN -7 AND -1 THEN 'Venceu nos últimos 7 dias'
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) BETWEEN -15 AND -8 THEN 'Venceu nos últimos 15 dias'
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) BETWEEN -30 AND -16 THEN 'Venceu nos últimos 30 dias'
WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC - SYSDATE, 0) < -30 THEN 'Venceu a mais de 30 dias'
END AS STATUS,
FIN.RECDESP AS CODRECDESP,
CASE WHEN FIN.RECDESP = 1 THEN 'Receita'
WHEN FIN.RECDESP = -1 THEN 'Despesa'
ELSE 'N/A' END AS RECDESP,
0 as RECEITAS,
0 AS DESPESAS,
(CASE WHEN RECDESP = 1 THEN VLRDESDOB END) AS RECABERTO,
(CASE WHEN RECDESP = -1 THEN VLRDESDOB END) AS DESPABERTO,
1 AS CODTIPOFIN,
'Títulos em Aberto' as TIPOFIN,
0 as SALDO,
0 AS DIF,
(CASE WHEN FIN.DTVENC >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN VLRDESDOB*RECDESP END) AS FLUXO
FROM TGFFIN FIN
LEFT JOIN TGFPAR PAR ON PAR.CODPARC = FIN.CODPARC
LEFT JOIN TGFTPP TPP ON TPP.CODTIPPARC = PAR.CODTIPPARC
LEFT JOIN TSICID CID ON CID.CODCID = PAR.CODCID
LEFT JOIN TSIUFS UF ON UF.CODUF = CID.UF
LEFT JOIN TSIREG REG ON REG.CODREG = PAR.CODREG
LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT ON NAT.CODNAT = FIN.CODNAT
LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT2 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-2) = NAT2.CODNAT
LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT3 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-4) = NAT3.CODNAT
LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT4 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-5) = NAT4.CODNAT
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = FIN.CODCENCUS
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS2 ON TRUNC(CUS.CODCENCUS,-3) = CUS2.CODCENCUS
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = FIN.CODEMP
LEFT JOIN TGFVEN VEN ON VEN.CODVEND = FIN.CODVEND
LEFT JOIN TGFVEN GER ON VEN.CODGER = GER.CODVEND
LEFT JOIN TGFTOP TOP ON TOP.CODTIPOPER = FIN.CODTIPOPER
AND FIN.DHTIPOPER = TOP.DHALTER
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT VALOR,
          OPCAO
   FROM TDDOPC
   WHERE NUCAMPO = 856) TPV ON (TPV.VALOR = TOP.TIPMOV)
LEFT JOIN TGFTIT TIT ON TIT.CODTIPTIT = FIN.CODTIPTIT
LEFT JOIN TSICTA CTA ON CTA.CODCTABCOINT = FIN.CODCTABCOINT
LEFT JOIN TSIBCO BCO ON BCO.CODBCO = FIN.CODBCO
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT VALOR,
          OPCAO
   FROM TDDOPC
   WHERE NUCAMPO = 1048) CLS ON (CLS.VALOR = CTA.CLASSE)
WHERE FIN.DHBAIXA IS NULL 

/*fim titulos em aberto*/


UNION ALL


/*inicio baixas*/

SELECT
TRUNC(DHBAIXA) AS DIA,
NUFIN AS CODNUFIN,
NUFIN AS NUFIN,
PAR.CODPARC AS CODPARC,
PAR.RAZAOSOCIAL AS PARCEIRO,
TPP.CODTIPPARC AS CODPERFIL,
TPP.DESCRTIPPARC AS PERFIL,
CID.CODCID AS CODCID,
CID.NOMECID AS CIDADE,
UF.UF AS CODUF,
UF.DESCRICAO AS UF,
REG.CODREG AS CODREG,
REG.NOMEREG AS REGIAO,
NAT.CODNAT AS CODNAT1,
NAT.DESCRNAT AS NAT1,
NAT2.CODNAT AS CODNAT2,
NAT2.DESCRNAT AS NAT2,
NAT3.CODNAT AS CODNAT3,
NAT3.DESCRNAT AS NAT3,
NAT4.CODNAT AS CODNAT4,
NAT4.DESCRNAT AS NAT4,
CUS.CODCENCUS AS CODCENCUS,
CUS.DESCRCENCUS CENCUS,
CUS2.CODCENCUS AS CODCENCUSPAI,
CUS2.DESCRCENCUS AS CENCUSPAI,
EMP.CODEMP AS CODEMP,
EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL AS EMPRESA,
VEN.CODVEND AS CODVEND,
VEN.APELIDO AS VENDEDOR ,
GER.CODVEND AS CODGER,
GER.APELIDO AS GERENTE,
TOP.CODTIPOPER AS CODTIPOPER,
TOP.DESCROPER AS TOP,
TOP.TIPMOV AS CODTIPMOV,
TPV.OPCAO AS TIPMOV,
TIT.CODTIPTIT AS CODTIPTIT,
TIT.DESCRTIPTIT AS TIPTIT,
CTA.CODCTABCOINT AS CODCTABCOINT,
CTA.DESCRICAO AS CTABCOINT,
BCO.CODBCO AS CODBCO,
BCO.ABREVIATURA AS BANCO,
CLS.VALOR AS CODCLASSE,
CLS.OPCAO AS CLASSE,
FIN.NUMCONTRATO AS CODCON,
FIN.NUMCONTRATO AS CONTRATO, 
'N' AS CODPROV,
'Não' AS PROVISAO,

CASE WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC) > TRUNC(FIN.DHBAIXA) THEN 6 
      WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC) < TRUNC(FIN.DHBAIXA) THEN 7
      WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC) = TRUNC(FIN.DHBAIXA)  THEN 8 END AS CODSTATUS,
CASE WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC) > TRUNC(FIN.DHBAIXA) THEN 'Atrasada' 
      WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC) < TRUNC(FIN.DHBAIXA) THEN 'Adiantada'
      WHEN TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC) = TRUNC(FIN.DHBAIXA)  THEN 'No vencimento' END AS STATUS ,

FIN.RECDESP AS CODRECDESP,
CASE WHEN FIN.RECDESP = 1 THEN 'Receita'
      WHEN FIN.RECDESP = -1 THEN 'Despesa'
      ELSE 'N/A' END AS RECDESP,
(CASE WHEN RECDESP = 1 THEN VLRBAIXA END)  as RECEITAS,
(CASE WHEN RECDESP = -1 THEN VLRBAIXA END) AS DESPESAS,
0 AS RECABERTO, 
0 AS DESPABERTO, 
2 AS CODTIPOFIN,
'Baixas' as TIPOFIN,

0 as SALDO,
0 AS DIF,
VLRBAIXA*RECDESP  AS FLUXO
FROM
TGFFIN FIN
LEFT JOIN TGFPAR PAR ON PAR.CODPARC = FIN.CODPARC
LEFT JOIN TGFTPP TPP ON TPP.CODTIPPARC = PAR.CODTIPPARC
LEFT JOIN TSICID CID ON CID.CODCID = PAR.CODCID
LEFT JOIN TSIUFS UF ON UF.CODUF = CID.UF
LEFT JOIN TSIREG REG ON REG.CODREG = PAR.CODREG
LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT ON NAT.CODNAT = FIN.CODNAT
LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT2 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-2) = NAT2.CODNAT
LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT3 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-4) = NAT3.CODNAT
LEFT JOIN TGFNAT NAT4 ON trunc(NAT.CODNAT,-5) = NAT4.CODNAT
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = FIN.CODCENCUS
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS2 ON TRUNC(CUS.CODCENCUS,-3) = CUS2.CODCENCUS
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = FIN.CODEMP
LEFT JOIN TGFVEN VEN ON VEN.CODVEND = FIN.CODVEND
LEFT JOIN TGFVEN GER ON VEN.CODGER = GER.CODVEND
LEFT JOIN TGFTOP TOP ON TOP.CODTIPOPER = FIN.CODTIPOPER AND FIN.DHTIPOPER = TOP.DHALTER
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT VALOR, OPCAO FROM TDDOPC WHERE NUCAMPO = 856) TPV ON (TPV.VALOR = TOP.TIPMOV)
LEFT JOIN TGFTIT TIT ON TIT.CODTIPTIT = FIN.CODTIPTIT
LEFT JOIN TSICTA CTA ON CTA.CODCTABCOINT = FIN.CODCTABCOINT
LEFT JOIN TSIBCO BCO ON BCO.CODBCO = FIN.CODBCO
LEFT JOIN
 (SELECT VALOR, OPCAO FROM TDDOPC WHERE NUCAMPO = 1048) CLS ON (CLS.VALOR = CTA.CLASSE)
WHERE
    FIN.DHBAIXA IS NOT NULL
AND
    PROVISAO = 'N'

    
/*fim baixas*/

    
UNION ALL


/*inicio envelope saldo inicial*/


SELECT TRUNC(DIA)  AS DIA,
       -999 AS CODNUFIN,
       -999 AS NUFIN,
       -999 AS CODPARC,
       'Nulo' AS PARCEIRO,
       -999 AS CODPERFIL,
       'Nulo' AS PERFIL,
       -999 AS CODCID,
       'Nulo' AS CIDADE,
       '-999' AS CODUF,
       'Nulo' AS UF,
       -999 AS CODREG,
       'Nulo' AS REGIAO,
       -999 AS CODNAT1,
       'Nulo' AS NAT1,
       -999 AS CODNAT2,
       'Nulo' AS NAT2,
       -999 AS CODNAT3,
       'Nulo' AS NAT3,
       -999 AS CODNAT4,
       'Nulo' AS NAT4,
       -999 AS CODCENCUS,
       'Nulo' AS CENCUS,
       -999 AS CODCENCUSPAI,
       'Nulo' AS CENCUSPAI,
        CODEMP,
        RAZAOSOCIAL AS EMPRESA,
       -999 AS CODVEND,
       'Nulo' AS VENDEDOR,
       -999 AS CODGER,
       'Nulo' AS GERENTE,
       -999 AS CODTIPOPER,
       'Nulo' AS TOP,
       '-999' AS CODTIPMOV,
       'Nulo' AS TIPMOV,
       -999 AS CODTIPTIT,
       'Nulo' AS TIPTIT,
       CODCTABCOINT, 
       CTABCOINT, 
       CODBCO, 
       BANCO, 
       CODCLASSE,
       CLASSE,
       -999 AS CODCON,
       -999 AS CONTRATO,
       'N' AS CODPROV,
       'Não' AS PROVISAO,
       -999 AS CODSTATUS,
       'Nulo' AS STATUS,
        -999 AS CODRECDESP,
        'Nulo' AS RECDESP,
        0 as RECEITAS,
        0 AS DESPESAS,
        0 AS RECABERTO,
        0 AS DESPABERTO,
        3 AS CODTIPOFIN,
        'Saldo Inicial' AS TIPOFIN,
        SALDO  AS SALDO,
        0 AS DIF,
        SALDO  AS FLUXO
FROM
(

SELECT 
DIA, 
CODEMP,
RAZAOSOCIAL,
CODCTABCOINT, 
CTABCOINT, 
CODBCO, 
BANCO, 
CODCLASSE,  
CLASSE, SUM(SALDOREAL) AS SALDOREAL, SUM(SALDOPROJ) AS SALDOPROJ,
CASE WHEN DIA < TRUNC(SYSDATE) -1 THEN (SUM(SALDOREAL)) ELSE
SUM(CASE WHEN TRUNC(DIA) = TRUNC(SYSDATE,'DD') -1 THEN SUM(SALDOREAL) ELSE 0 END  + SUM(SALDOPROJ)) OVER (PARTITION BY CODEMP, RAZAOSOCIAL, CODCTABCOINT, CTABCOINT, CODBCO, BANCO, CODCLASSE, CLASSE  ORDER BY DIA) END AS SALDO
FROM (

/*inicio saldo inicial PROJETADO<<<<<<<< AQUI ESTA O PROBLEMA*/

SELECT TRUNC(B.DIA) AS DIA,
             EMP.CODEMP AS CODEMP,
             EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
             CTA.CODCTABCOINT AS CODCTABCOINT,
             CTA.DESCRICAO AS CTABCOINT,
             BCO.CODBCO AS CODBCO,
             BCO.ABREVIATURA AS BANCO,
             CLS.VALOR AS CODCLASSE,
             CLS.OPCAO AS CLASSE,
             0 AS SALDOREAL,
             NVL(B.SALDOPROJ1,0) + NVL(B.SALDOPROJ2, 0) AS SALDOPROJ,
             0 AS FLUXO
      FROM
        (SELECT PRONOV.DIA,
                CTA.CODCTABCOINT,
                CTA.CODEMP,

           (SELECT SUM(VLRDESDOB*RECDESP)
            FROM TGFFIN FIN
            WHERE TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC,'DD')= TRUNC(PRONOV.DIA,'DD')
              AND FIN.CODCTABCOINT = CTA.CODCTABCOINT
              AND FIN.CODEMP=CTA.CODEMP
              AND DHBAIXA IS NULL
            
              --AND PROVISAO='N'
              AND TRUNC(FIN.DTVENC) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)) AS SALDOPROJ1, 
              (SELECT SUM(VLRBAIXA*RECDESP)
            FROM TGFFIN FIN
            WHERE TRUNC(FIN.DHBAIXA,'DD')= TRUNC(PRONOV.DIA,'DD')
              AND FIN.CODCTABCOINT = CTA.CODCTABCOINT
              AND FIN.CODEMP=CTA.CODEMP
              AND PROVISAO='N'
              AND TRUNC(FIN.DHBAIXA) >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)
              

              ) AS SALDOPROJ2
         FROM
           (SELECT ULTIMO - ROWNUM + 1 AS DIA,
                   ROWNUM,
                   QUANTIDADE
            FROM
              (SELECT SYSDATE + 90 AS ULTIMO,
                      91 AS QUANTIDADE
               FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= QUANTIDADE) PRONOV,
                                                           TSICTA CTA
         WHERE 
            CTA.ATIVA = 'S')B
      LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON B.CODEMP = EMP.CODEMP
      LEFT JOIN TSICTA CTA ON CTA.CODCTABCOINT = B.CODCTABCOINT
      LEFT JOIN TSIBCO BCO ON BCO.CODBCO = CTA.CODBCO
      LEFT JOIN
        (SELECT VALOR,
                OPCAO
         FROM TDDOPC
         WHERE NUCAMPO = 1048) CLS ON (CLS.VALOR = CTA.CLASSE)


/*fim saldo inicial PROJETADO*/


UNION ALL

/*inicio saldo inicial real*/


SELECT TRUNC(DIA)  AS DIA, CTA.CODEMP,
       EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
       CTA.CODCTABCOINT AS CODCTABCOINT,
       CTA.DESCRICAO AS CTABCOINT,
       BCO.CODBCO AS CODBCO,
       BCO.ABREVIATURA AS BANCO,
       CLS.VALOR AS CODCLASSE, 
       CLS.OPCAO AS CLASSE,
       SALDO + MOVIMENTO AS SALDOREAL, 
       0 AS SALDOPROJ,
       SALDO + MOVIMENTO AS FLUXO
FROM
  (SELECT DIAS.DIA,
          C.DESCRICAO,
          C.CODCTABCOINT,
          C.CODEMP,
          NVL(SUM(S.SALDOREAL),0) AS SALDO,
          NVL(SUM(
                    (SELECT SUM(M.VLRLANC*M.RECDESP)
                     FROM TGFMBC M
                     WHERE M.CODCTABCOINT = S.CODCTABCOINT
                       AND TO_CHAR(M.DTLANC,'MMYYYY') = TO_CHAR(DIAS.DIA, 'MMYYYY')
                       AND TRUNC(M.DTLANC) <= DIAS.DIA)),0) AS MOVIMENTO
                       
   FROM TGFSBC S
   INNER JOIN TSICTA C ON S.CODCTABCOINT = C.CODCTABCOINT,
     (SELECT ULTIMO - ROWNUM + 1 AS DIA,
             ROWNUM,
             QUANTIDADE
      FROM
        (SELECT SYSDATE AS ULTIMO,
                SYSDATE - TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YEAR') + 1 AS QUANTIDADE
         FROM DUAL) CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= QUANTIDADE) DIAS
   WHERE S.REFERENCIA =
       (SELECT MAX(REFERENCIA)
        FROM TGFSBC SBC
        WHERE SBC.CODCTABCOINT = S.CODCTABCOINT
          AND REFERENCIA <= DIAS.DIA)
     AND DESCRICAO NOT LIKE 'INATIVA%'
     AND DESCRICAO NOT LIKE 'INATVA%' 
     AND  C.ATIVA = 'S'
   GROUP BY C.DESCRICAO,
            C.CODCTABCOINT,
            C.CODEMP,
            DIAS.DIA) A
LEFT JOIN TSICTA CTA ON CTA.CODCTABCOINT = A.CODCTABCOINT
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = A.CODEMP
LEFT JOIN TSIBCO BCO ON BCO.CODBCO = CTA.CODBCO
LEFT JOIN
  (SELECT VALOR,
          OPCAO
   FROM TDDOPC
   WHERE NUCAMPO = 1048) CLS ON (CLS.VALOR = CTA.CLASSE)
   )
GROUP BY
DIA, 
CODEMP,
RAZAOSOCIAL,
CODCTABCOINT, 
CTABCOINT, 
CODBCO, 
BANCO, 
CODCLASSE, 
CLASSE
) 

/*fim saldo inicial real*/


UNION ALL

/*início variação mov fin*/


SELECT TRUNC(DIA) AS DIA,
       -999 AS CODNUFIN,
       -999 AS NUFIN,
       -999 AS CODPARC,
       'Nulo' AS PARCEIRO,
       -999 AS CODPERFIL,
       'Nulo' AS PERFIL,
       -999 AS CODCID,
       'Nulo' AS CIDADE,
       '-999' AS CODUF,
       'Nulo' AS UF,
       -999 AS CODREG,
       'Nulo' AS REGIAO,
       -999 AS CODNAT1,
       'Nulo' AS NAT1,
       -999 AS CODNAT2,
       'Nulo' AS NAT2,
       -999 AS CODNAT3,
       'Nulo' AS NAT3,
       -999 AS CODNAT4,
       'Nulo' AS NAT4,
       -999 AS CODCENCUS,
       'Nulo' AS CENCUS,
       -999 AS CODCENCUSPAI,
       'Nulo' AS CENCUSPAI,
        CODEMP,
        RAZAOSOCIAL AS EMPRESA,
       -999 AS CODVEND,
       'Nulo' AS VENDEDOR,
       -999 AS CODGER,
       'Nulo' AS GERENTE,
       -999 AS CODTIPOPER,
       'Nulo' AS TOP,
       '-999' AS CODTIPMOV,
       'Nulo' AS TIPMOV,
       -999 AS CODTIPTIT,
       'Nulo' AS TIPTIT,
       CODCTABCOINT AS CODCTABCOINT,
       DESCRICAO AS CTABCOINT,
       CODBCO AS CODBCO,
       ABREVIATURA AS BANCO,
       VALOR AS CODCLASSE,
       OPCAO AS CLASSE,
       -999 AS CODCON,
       -999 AS CONTRATO,
       'N' AS CODPROV,
       'Não' AS PROVISAO,
       -999 AS CODSTATUS,
       'Nulo' AS STATUS,
       -999 AS CODRECDESP,
        'Nulo' AS RECDESP,
        0 as RECEITAS,
        0 AS DESPESAS,
        0 AS RECABERTO,
        0 AS DESPABERTO,
        4 AS CODTIPOFIN,
        'Diferença' AS TIPOFIN,
        0 AS SALDO,
        DIF*-1 AS DIF,
        DIF*-1 AS FLUXO

FROM
(SELECT TRUNC(FIN.DHBAIXA) AS DIA,
        CTA.CODCTABCOINT,
        CTA.DESCRICAO,
        BCO.CODBCO,
        EMP.CODEMP,
        EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
        BCO.ABREVIATURA,
        CLS.VALOR,
        CLS.OPCAO,
        SUM(FIN.VLRBAIXA*FIN.RECDESP) AS DIF
FROM TGFFIN FIN
LEFT JOIN TSICTA CTA ON CTA.CODCTABCOINT = FIN.CODCTABCOINT
LEFT JOIN TSIBCO BCO ON BCO.CODBCO = FIN.CODBCO
LEFT JOIN (SELECT VALOR, OPCAO FROM TDDOPC WHERE NUCAMPO = 1048) CLS ON (CLS.VALOR = CTA.CLASSE)
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = FIN.CODEMP
WHERE PROVISAO = 'N'
AND TRUNC(DHBAIXA) <= SYSDATE

GROUP BY FIN.DHBAIXA,
         CTA.CODCTABCOINT,
         CTA.DESCRICAO,
         BCO.CODBCO,
         BCO.ABREVIATURA,
         CLS.VALOR,
         EMP.CODEMP,
         EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
         CLS.OPCAO
         
UNION ALL

SELECT TRUNC(MBC.DTLANC) AS DIA,
       CTA.CODCTABCOINT,
       CTA.DESCRICAO,
       BCO.CODBCO,
       EMP.CODEMP,
       EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
       BCO.ABREVIATURA,
       CLS.VALOR,
       CLS.OPCAO,
       SUM(MBC.VLRLANC*MBC.RECDESP*-1) AS DIF
FROM TGFMBC MBC
LEFT JOIN TSICTA CTA ON CTA.CODCTABCOINT = MBC.CODCTABCOINT
LEFT JOIN TSIBCO BCO ON BCO.CODBCO = CTA.CODBCO
LEFT JOIN (SELECT VALOR, OPCAO FROM TDDOPC  WHERE NUCAMPO = 1048) CLS ON (CLS.VALOR = CTA.CLASSE)
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = CTA.CODEMP
WHERE TRUNC(MBC.DTLANC) <= SYSDATE 

GROUP BY MBC.DTLANC,
         CTA.CODCTABCOINT,
         CTA.DESCRICAO,
         BCO.CODBCO,
         BCO.ABREVIATURA,
         CLS.VALOR,
         EMP.CODEMP,
         EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
         CLS.OPCAO )) 
         
         /*fim variação mov fin*/

templates.name: Análises de folha de pagamento
templates.defaultQuery:
SELECT
    TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM/YYYY') AS "Mes",
    HFU.CODEMP AS "ID Empresa",
    EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL AS "Empresa",
    DEP.CODDEP AS "ID Departamento",
    DEP.DESCRDEP AS "Departamento",
    CUS.CODCENCUS AS "ID Centro de Resultado",
    CUS.DESCRCENCUS AS "Centro de Resultado",
    CAR.CODCARGO AS "ID Cargo",
    CAR.DESCRCARGO AS "Cargo",
    FCO.CODFUNCAO AS "ID Função",
    FCO.DESCRFUNCAO AS "Função",
    -999 AS "ID Evento",
    'Nulo' AS "Evento",
    FUN.CODFUNC AS "ID Colaborador",
    FUN.NOMEFUNC AS "Colaborador",
    COUNT(DISTINCT HFU.CODFUNC) AS "Headcount",
    0 AS "Quantidade Admissões",
    0 AS "Quantidade Demissões",
    0 AS "Folha de Pagamento"
FROM
    TFPHFU HFU
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = HFU.CODEMP
LEFT JOIN TFPFCO FCO ON FCO.CODFUNCAO = HFU.CODFUNCAO
LEFT JOIN TFPCAR CAR ON HFU.CODCARGO = CAR.CODCARGO
LEFT JOIN TFPDEP DEP ON DEP.CODDEP = HFU.CODDEP
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = DEP.CODCENCUS
LEFT JOIN TFPFUN FUN ON HFU.CODFUNC = FUN.CODFUNC
WHERE HFU.SITUACAO <> 0
GROUP BY 
    TO_CHAR(REFERENCIA, 'MM/YYYY'),
    DEP.CODDEP,
    CAR.CODCARGO,
    FCO.CODFUNCAO,
    DEP.DESCRDEP,
    CUS.CODCENCUS,
    CUS.DESCRCENCUS,
    CAR.CODCARGO,
    CAR.DESCRCARGO,
    FCO.CODFUNCAO ,
    FCO.DESCRFUNCAO,
    HFU.CODEMP,
    EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
    FUN.CODFUNC,
    FUN.NOMEFUNC
UNION ALL
SELECT
    TO_CHAR(DTADM, 'MM/YYYY') AS "Mes",
    EMP.CODEMP AS "ID Empresa",
    EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL AS "Empresa",
    DEP.CODDEP AS "ID Departamento",
    DEP.DESCRDEP AS "Departamento",
    CUS.CODCENCUS AS "ID Centro de Resultado",
    CUS.DESCRCENCUS AS "Centro de Resultado",
    CAR.CODCARGO AS "ID Cargo",
    CAR.DESCRCARGO AS "Cargo",
    FCO.CODFUNCAO AS "ID Função",
    FCO.DESCRFUNCAO AS "Função",
    -999 AS "ID Evento",
    'Nulo' AS "Evento",
    FUN.CODFUNC AS "ID Colaborador",
    FUN.NOMEFUNC AS "Colaborador",
    0 AS "Headcount",
    COUNT(DISTINCT CODFUNC) AS "Quantidade Admissões",
    0 AS "Quantidade Demissões",
    0 AS "Folha de Pagamento"
FROM
        TFPFUN FUN
LEFT JOIN TFPFCO FCO ON FCO.CODFUNCAO = FUN.CODFUNCAO
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = FUN.CODEMP
LEFT JOIN TFPCAR CAR ON FUN.CODCARGO = CAR.CODCARGO
LEFT JOIN TFPDEP DEP ON DEP.CODDEP = FUN.CODDEP
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = DEP.CODCENCUS
GROUP BY
    TO_CHAR(DTADM, 'MM/YYYY'),
    DEP.CODDEP,
    CAR.CODCARGO,
    FCO.CODFUNCAO,
    DEP.DESCRDEP,
    CUS.CODCENCUS,
    CUS.DESCRCENCUS,
    CAR.CODCARGO,
    CAR.DESCRCARGO,
    FCO.CODFUNCAO ,
    FCO.DESCRFUNCAO,
    EMP.CODEMP,
    EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
    FUN.CODFUNC,
    FUN.NOMEFUNC
UNION ALL
SELECT
    TO_CHAR(DTDEM, 'MM/YYYY') AS "Mes",
    EMP.CODEMP AS "ID Empresa",
    EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL AS "Empresa",
    DEP.CODDEP AS "ID Departamento",
    DEP.DESCRDEP AS "Departamento",
    CUS.CODCENCUS AS "ID Centro de Resultado",
    CUS.DESCRCENCUS AS "Centro de Resultado",
    CAR.CODCARGO AS "ID Cargo",
    CAR.DESCRCARGO AS "Cargo",
    FCO.CODFUNCAO AS "ID Função",
    FCO.DESCRFUNCAO AS "Função",
    -999 AS "ID Evento",
    'Nulo' AS "Evento",
    FUN.CODFUNC AS "ID Colaborador",
    FUN.NOMEFUNC AS "Colaborador",
    0 AS "Headcount",
    0 AS "Quantidade Admissões",
    COUNT(DISTINCT CODFUNC) AS "Quantidade Demissões",
    0 AS "Folha de Pagamento"
FROM
        TFPFUN FUN
LEFT JOIN TFPFCO FCO ON FCO.CODFUNCAO = FUN.CODFUNCAO
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = FUN.CODEMP
LEFT JOIN TFPCAR CAR ON FUN.CODCARGO = CAR.CODCARGO
LEFT JOIN TFPDEP DEP ON DEP.CODDEP = FUN.CODDEP
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = DEP.CODCENCUS
WHERE DTDEM IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    TO_CHAR(DTDEM, 'MM/YYYY'),
    DEP.CODDEP,
    CAR.CODCARGO,
    FCO.CODFUNCAO,
    DEP.DESCRDEP,
    CUS.CODCENCUS,
    CUS.DESCRCENCUS,
    CAR.CODCARGO,
    CAR.DESCRCARGO,
    FCO.CODFUNCAO ,
    FCO.DESCRFUNCAO,
    EMP.CODEMP,
    EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
    FUN.CODFUNC,
    FUN.NOMEFUNC
UNION ALL
SELECT
       TO_CHAR(FOL.REFERENCIA, 'MM/YYYY') AS "Mes",
       HFU.CODEMP AS "ID Empresa",
       EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL AS "Empresa",
       DEP.CODDEP AS "ID Departamento",
       DEP.DESCRDEP AS "Departamento",
       CUS.CODCENCUS AS "ID Centro de Resultado",
       CUS.DESCRCENCUS AS "Centro de Resultado",
       CAR.CODCARGO AS "ID Cargo",
       CAR.DESCRCARGO AS "Cargo",
       FCO.CODFUNCAO AS "ID Função",
       FCO.DESCRFUNCAO AS "Função",
       FOL.CODEVENTO AS "ID Evento",
       EVE.DESCREVENTO AS "Evento",
       FUN.CODFUNC AS "ID Colaborador",
       FUN.NOMEFUNC AS "Colaborador",
       0 AS "Headcount",
       0 AS "Quantidade Admissões",
       0 AS "Quantidade Demissões",
       SUM(FOL.VLREVENTO) AS "Folha de Pagamento"
FROM TFPFOL FOL
LEFT JOIN TFPHFU HFU ON HFU.CODFUNC = FOL.CODFUNC
AND HFU.REFERENCIA = FOL.REFERENCIA
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = HFU.CODEMP
LEFT JOIN TFPFCO FCO ON FCO.CODFUNCAO = HFU.CODFUNCAO
LEFT JOIN TFPCAR CAR ON HFU.CODCARGO = CAR.CODCARGO
LEFT JOIN TFPDEP DEP ON DEP.CODDEP = HFU.CODDEP
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = DEP.CODCENCUS
LEFT JOIN TFPFUN FUN ON FUN.CODFUNC = FOL.CODFUNC
LEFT JOIN TFPEVE EVE ON EVE.CODEVENTO = FOL.CODEVENTO
LEFT JOIN (SELECT VALOR,OPCAO FROM TDDOPC WHERE NUCAMPO = 1847) SIT ON (SIT.VALOR = HFU.SITUACAO)
GROUP BY HFU.CODEMP,
         FCO.CODFUNCAO,
         EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
         FCO.DESCRFUNCAO,
         CAR.CODCARGO,
         CAR.DESCRCARGO,
         TO_CHAR(FOL.REFERENCIA, 'MM/YYYY'),
         DEP.CODDEP,
         DEP.DESCRDEP,
         CUS.CODCENCUS,
         CUS.DESCRCENCUS,
         EVE.DESCREVENTO,
         FOL.CODEVENTO,
         FUN.CODFUNC,
         FUN.NOMEFUNC

templates.name: Análises contábeis
templates.defaultQuery:
SELECT
REFERENCIA AS DATA,
TO_NUMBER(CODEMP) AS CODEMP,
EMPRESA,
TO_NUMBER(CODCENCUS) AS CODCENCUS,
CENCUS,
TO_NUMBER(CODCENCUSPAI) AS CODCENCUSPAI,
CENCUSPAI,
CODCTANV1,
DESCRCTANV1,
CODCTANV2,
DESCRCTANV2,
CODCTANV3,
DESCRCTANV3,
CODCTANV4,
DESCRCTANV4,
SUM(VALOR) AS RESULT

FROM
(
SELECT LAN.REFERENCIA,
NVL(LAN.CODEMP, -999) AS CODEMP,
NVL(EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL, 'Nulo') AS EMPRESA,
NVL(CUS.CODCENCUS, -999) AS CODCENCUS,
NVL(CUS.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') AS CENCUS,
NVL(CUS2.CODCENCUS, -999) AS CODCENCUSPAI,
NVL(CUS2.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') AS CENCUSPAI,
NVL(PLA.CTACTB, -999) AS CODCTANV1,
NVL(PLA.DESCRCTA,'Nulo') AS DESCRCTANV1,
NVL(PAI.CTACTB, -999) AS CODCTANV2,
NVL(PAI.DESCRCTA,'Nulo') AS DESCRCTANV2,
NVL(AVO.CTACTB, -999)  AS CODCTANV3,
NVL(AVO.DESCRCTA,'Nulo') AS DESCRCTANV3,
NVL(BIS.CTACTB, -999) AS CODCTANV4,
NVL(BIS.DESCRCTA,'Nulo') AS DESCRCTANV4,
SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN LAN.VLRLANC ELSE LAN.VLRLANC * -1 END) AS VALOR

FROM TCBLAN LAN
LEFT JOIN TCBPLA PLA ON PLA.CODCTACTB = LAN.CODCTACTB
LEFT JOIN TCBPLA PAI ON PAI.CODCTACTB = PLA.CODCTACTBPAI
LEFT JOIN TCBPLA AVO ON AVO.CODCTACTB = PAI.CODCTACTBPAI
LEFT JOIN TCBPLA BIS ON BIS.CODCTACTB = AVO.CODCTACTBPAI
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = LAN.CODEMP
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = LAN.CODCENCUS
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS2 ON TRUNC(CUS.CODCENCUS,-3) = CUS2.CODCENCUS

WHERE LAN.REFERENCIA <= SYSDATE
  AND (PLA.CTACTB LIKE '3.%'
       OR PLA.CTACTB LIKE '4.%'
       OR PLA.CTACTB LIKE '5.%')

GROUP BY 
REFERENCIA,
LAN.CODEMP,
PLA.CTACTB,
PLA.DESCRCTA,
PAI.CTACTB,
PAI.DESCRCTA,
AVO.CTACTB,
AVO.DESCRCTA,
BIS.CTACTB,
BIS.DESCRCTA,
EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
CUS.CODCENCUS,
CUS.DESCRCENCUS,
CUS2.CODCENCUS,
CUS2.DESCRCENCUS

UNION ALL

SELECT LAN.REFERENCIA,
NVL(LAN.CODEMP, -999) AS CODEMP,
NVL(EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL, 'Nulo') AS EMPRESA,
NVL(CUS.CODCENCUS, -999) AS CODCENCUS,
NVL(CUS.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') AS CENCUS,
NVL(CUS2.CODCENCUS, -999) AS CODCENCUSPAI,
NVL(CUS2.DESCRCENCUS, 'Nulo') AS CENCUSPAI,
NVL(PLA.CTACTB, -999) AS CODCTANV1,
NVL(PLA.DESCRCTA,'Nulo') AS DESCRCTANV1,
NVL(PAI.CTACTB, -999) AS CODCTANV2,
NVL(PAI.DESCRCTA,'Nulo') AS DESCRCTANV2,
NVL(AVO.CTACTB, -999)  AS CODCTANV3,
NVL(AVO.DESCRCTA,'Nulo') AS DESCRCTANV3,
NVL(BIS.CTACTB, -999) AS CODCTANV4,
NVL(BIS.DESCRCTA,'Nulo') AS DESCRCTANV4,
SUM(CASE WHEN LAN.TIPLANC = 'R' THEN LAN.VLRLANC ELSE LAN.VLRLANC * -1 END) AS VALOR

FROM TCBLAN LAN
LEFT JOIN TCBPLA PLA ON PLA.CODCTACTB = LAN.CODCTACTB
LEFT JOIN TCBPLA PAI ON PAI.CODCTACTB = PLA.CODCTACTBPAI
LEFT JOIN TCBPLA AVO ON AVO.CODCTACTB = PAI.CODCTACTBPAI
LEFT JOIN TCBPLA BIS ON BIS.CODCTACTB = AVO.CODCTACTBPAI
LEFT JOIN TSIEMP EMP ON EMP.CODEMP = LAN.CODEMP
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS ON CUS.CODCENCUS = LAN.CODCENCUS
LEFT JOIN TSICUS CUS2 ON TRUNC(CUS.CODCENCUS,-3) = CUS2.CODCENCUS

WHERE LAN.REFERENCIA <= SYSDATE
  AND (PLA.CTACTB LIKE '3.%'
       OR PLA.CTACTB LIKE '4.%'
       OR PLA.CTACTB LIKE '5.%')
AND LAN.CODCTACTB IN   (SELECT E.CODCTACTBENCRES FROM TCBEMP E)

GROUP BY 
REFERENCIA,
LAN.CODEMP,
PLA.CTACTB,
PLA.DESCRCTA,
PAI.CTACTB,
PAI.DESCRCTA,
AVO.CTACTB,
AVO.DESCRCTA,
BIS.CTACTB,
BIS.DESCRCTA,
EMP.RAZAOSOCIAL,
CUS.CODCENCUS,
CUS.DESCRCENCUS,
CUS2.CODCENCUS,
CUS2.DESCRCENCUS
    ) 
    

GROUP BY
REFERENCIA,
CODEMP,
EMPRESA,
CODCENCUS,
CODCTANV1,
DESCRCTANV1,
CODCTANV2,
DESCRCTANV2,
CODCTANV3,
DESCRCTANV3,
CODCTANV4,
DESCRCTANV4,
CENCUS,
CENCUSPAI,
CODCENCUSPAI
